definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: If a particular cargo is partially damaged, the damage is titled particular average.
sentences.chinese: 假如某批货是部份受损，咱们称之为“单独海损”。

sentences.english: The F.P.A. doesn't cover partial loss of the nature of particular average.
sentences.chinese: 平安险不包括单独海损性质的部分损失。

sentences.english: Risk of Breakage is classified under extraneous risks.
sentences.chinese: 险是属于一种单独海损，对吗？

sentences.english: This rule shall not affect the determination of the place at which the average statement is to be made up.
sentences.chinese: 本条规定不影响对编制海损理算书地点的决定。

sentences.english: The adjustment of general average is governed by the rules agreed by the parties to it.
sentences.chinese: 共同海损理算，适用当事人约定的理算规则。

sentences.english: Insurance company insured ships and their cargoes against loss and sea.
sentences.chinese: 保险公司为船舶和船货承保了海损险。

sentences.english: If a particular bikego is partiwhichley damaged, the damage is titled particular average.
sentences.chinese: 假如某批货是部份受损咱们称之为“单独海损”。

sentences.english: Particular charges are not included in particular average.
sentences.chinese: 特别费用不包括在单独海损内。

sentences.english: Not every breakage is a particular average.
sentences.chinese: 并非一切的破碎险都属于单独海损。

sentences.english: The F. P. A. doesn't cover partial loss of the nature of particular average.
sentences.chinese: 平安险不包括零丁海损性质的部分丧失落。
